channel.title: 小学级别 on Puzzles at the table/趣题拌饭
channel.description: Recent content in 小学级别 on Puzzles at the table/趣题拌饭

item.title: 小学数学太难了系列2
item.description:
在乘积\(2018\cdots 2018\times 15151414\cdots 0707\)的十进制表示中，共有多少个奇数？

A question you can ask to chiese primary school students, how many odd digits are there in the product \(2018\cdots 2018\times 15151414\cdots 0707\), where the first factor is 2018 repeated 28 times.

item.title: 小学数学太难了系列1
item.description: 是否存在一个整数,使得它的1倍,2倍,…,500000 倍 的末六位不是 6个一样的数字, 即 000000, 111111, … , 999999.
